function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Disease transmission in the built environment due to social interactions and legitimacy-seeking activities","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious diseases spreading in the built environment","Mitigation":"Implementing strict hygiene and social distancing measures, promoting remote work where possible","Technologies":"Air filtration systems, contactless technology for transactions, remote work tools","People":"Employees, customers, and visitors in the built environment","Owner":"Employers, building managers, and administrators"}]}
